channel.title: How do u change the name of an item(server side not client side)
channel.description: do u go into item.cfg and change the name in there

item.title: How do u change the name of an item(server side not client side)
item.dc:creator: @keep_on_runnin keep on runnin
item.description:
@keep_on_runnin wrote:

its not possible to change it from server side only from item cfg but that only changes it from the shop point of view
